From:

Subject: Motions to 
Suppress 
Date: Mon, 22 Feb 2021 18:59:12 +0000 
Attachments: Motion to Suppress Opp v6.docx 
I can start looking at this. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, February 22, 2021 1:44 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subt o ions o uppress 
Thanks very much. Attached is a revised draft for your review. Should I plan to send this to after I get back your next 
edits? I gave him a heads up that I was hoping to send it to him later today. Separately, I have been thinking a bit more 
about the documents that we are planning to attach as exhibits, and I was hoping that we could discuss as a team with 
you both. I was hoping to do that before I reach out to to let her know our plan. I'm available for a call 
whenever is best for others today. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Saturday, February 20, 2021 6:02 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Motions to Suppress 
Really nice work on this. Some combined comments in track. Would love to see again after you've had a  chance to 
review/clean up and, of course, happy to discuss in the interim. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, February 18, 2021 4:44 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Motions to Suppress 
â€¢,
>; 
Attached is a draft of the opposition to the defense's suppression motions (motions 3 and 11), which are attached here for 
reference. I wrote this as one section with several subheadings since I think the issues are entangled (and that helps 
explain the length of this), but happy to discuss further. edits are incorporated in this draft. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00021377
